SQLQuery.Roles: SELECT Dolshnosti.DolshNum, Dolshnosti.Dolshnost FROM Dolshnosti ORDER BY Dolshnosti.DolshNum ASC
SQLQuery.Users: select Familija_imja_ot.UserNum, Familija_imja_ot.Familija, Familija_imja_ot.Imja, Familija_imja_ot.Otchestvo, Familija_imja_ot.TabNum, Familija_imja_ot.Pass, Dolshnosti.Dolshnost from Familija_imja_ot LEFT JOIN Dolshnosti ON (Familija_imja_ot.Dolshnost = Dolshnosti.DolshNum) WHERE Familija_imja_ot.Activ = 1 ORDER BY Familija_imja_ot.Familija ASC
SQLQuery.UpdateUserWithoutPass: UPDATE Familija_imja_ot SET Familija_imja_ot.Imja = "{1}", Familija_imja_ot.Familija = "{2}", Familija_imja_ot.Otchestvo = "{3}", Familija_imja_ot.TabNum = {4}, Familija_imja_ot.Dolshnost = {5} WHERE Familija_imja_ot.UserNum IN({0})
SQLQuery.UpdateUserWithPass: UPDATE Familija_imja_ot SET Familija_imja_ot.Imja = "{1}", Familija_imja_ot.Familija = "{2}", Familija_imja_ot.Otchestvo = "{3}", Familija_imja_ot.TabNum = {4}, Familija_imja_ot.Dolshnost = {5}, Familija_imja_ot.Pass = "{6}" WHERE Familija_imja_ot.UserNum IN({0})
SQLQuery.AddUser: INSERT INTO Familija_imja_ot(Familija_imja_ot.Familija, Familija_imja_ot.Imja, Familija_imja_ot.Otchestvo, Familija_imja_ot.Pass, Familija_imja_ot.TabNum, Familija_imja_ot.Dolshnost,Familija_imja_ot.Activ) VALUES("{0}","{1}","{2}","{3}",{4},{5}, 1)
SQLQuery.HideUsers: UPDATE Familija_imja_ot SET Familija_imja_ot.Activ = 0 WHERE Familija_imja_ot.UserNum IN({0})
SQLQuery.Barabans: SELECT * FROM Tipy_baraban ORDER BY Tipy_baraban.TipName ASC
SQLQuery.ShowCables: SELECT Cables.CabNum, Cables.CabName, CabNameStruct, norm_docum.DocNum, Cables.TextPrim, Cables.KodOKP, Cables.KodOKP_KCH FROM Cables LEFT JOIN norm_docum ON (Cables.DocInd = norm_docum.DocInd)
SQLQuery.ShowCableMarks: SELECT Distinct Cables.CabName from Cables ORDER BY Cables.CabName ASC
SQLQuery.ShowNormaDocs: SELECT Distinct Norm_Docum.DocInd, Norm_Docum.DocNum, Norm_Docum.DocName from Norm_Docum ORDER BY Norm_Docum.DocNum ASC
SQLQuery.ShowStructTypes: SELECT * from Tipy_Poviv ORDER BY Tipy_Poviv.StruktNum ASC
SQLQuery.ShowLeadsMaterial: SELECT Materialy_Gil.MaterInd, Materialy_Gil.MaterName from Materialy_Gil ORDER BY Materialy_Gil.MaterInd ASC
SQLQuery.ShowLeadsDiameters: SELECT Distinct Struktury_Cab.DiamGil from Struktury_Cab ORDER BY Struktury_Cab.DiamGil ASC
SQLQuery.ShowIsolationMaterial: SELECT Materialy_Izol.MaterInd, Materialy_Izol.MaterName from Materialy_Izol ORDER BY Materialy_Izol.MaterInd ASC
SQLQuery.ShowWaveResistance: SELECT Distinct Struktury_Cab.Zwave from Struktury_Cab ORDER BY Struktury_Cab.Zwave ASC
SQLQuery.ShowDrFormuls: SELECT * from dr_formuls ORDER BY dr_formuls.drind ASC
SQLQuery.ShowDrPrivFormuls: SELECT * from dr_priv_formuls ORDER BY dr_priv_formuls.drprivind ASC
